website_summaries.verdict: Middle of the road affordability and performance makes this a good option for people wanting to upgrade their thermostat without spending a fortune.
pros: Optional pack of two units makes the buy more economic than buying individual thermostats
Read out is clear to see in various conditions
cons: Installation without help can be complicated

website_summaries.verdict: Honeywell's Wi-Fi Smart Thermostat can compete directly with the Nest Learning Thermostat on features, but it doesn't match the Nest's intuitive design.
pros: Along with straightforward management software, the Honeywell Wi-Fi Smart Thermostat quickly learns your energy usage habits and adapts accordingly
cons: Ease of installation will vary widely depending on your experience with wiring and the type of heating and cooling system you have

customer_reviews.title: Bad Units !!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am an HVAC contractor and I can only tell you that these units are junk. They only last a little over one year before they start short cycling the furnace. Being that this is the retail model it only carries a one year warranty. All the units I have installed are crapping the bed shortly one year after installation. If you want the five year warranty you better purchase from a distributor. No one will help in this matter as they pretty much shut the door in our faces. DO NOT BUY !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dwcofazio

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this this in August but only had it installed the end of December. I've been using this for 6 weeks and it will nonlingwr connect to the internet. I was on the phone with customer service for 1 hr and 40 minutes trying to use my phone as a hot spot to see if it was my service provider, reset to factory settings...nothing. They are sending out a replacement but honestly, I am so disappointed with this purchase. I really hope the new one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.text: I never tried mine with Alexa but the app works great. Seems to keep the house at the correct temperature. I did notice an improvement in my electric bill after removing my old t-stat and installing this one. I'm assuming that the improvement was due to the t-stat actually working as designed unlike my old t-stat that was a cheep builder grade t-stat installed by my builder not to mention I can keep an eye on things with the app.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Nicholson III

customer_reviews.title: No customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I previously gave this thermostat a great review; that was before I had problems. The internet features didn't work once fall arrived and the temperature in my 2nd home fell below 58 degrees. I called customer support for weeks before I could get thru to a representative and when I finally did, I ended up with someone who could hardly speak English and kept telling me it was impossible my thermostat didn't work but I could send it to them. That does me no good; I would have no heat in the winter while I was waiting for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: David A Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It's great when it works.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for a couple of years now. When it works, it is fine. The main problem is that if my wifi goes down then it disconnects and won't reconnect without completely resetting the unit online. Literally every other smart/online device I have will automatically reconnect, but not this, it is a real pain. The website is completely unhelpful and the UI is a terrible. It is also very difficult dealing with daylight saving time changes. I will not purchase another Honeywell unit in the future and considering how annoying this one is, I am considering replacing it with another company's product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my second Honeywell Smart Wi-Fi thermostat
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Honeywell Smart Wi-Fi thermostat. This one was installed in our elderly mother's home since she cannot see or operate a modern thermostat. Installed in about 15 minutes, and now I can manage her heating and cooling remotely without a long trip to keep her comfortable. The one in our home has been in operation for 3-years with no problem Always nice to managed the HVAC remotely and very easy to program.
customer_reviews.author: Cirquerider

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 16 months
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very pleased with the Honeywell. It did everything as advertised. However, the fan control failed after 16 months. That is the G connection for the wiring. My HVAC company inspected the system and had to replace the thermostat with a manual one just to get the air back on. So I contacted the vendor, and Honeywell. Neither would replace the very expensive broken thermostat. I do understand the "1 year Warranty". But if their products only last 4 months longer than the warranty I have to not recommend buying their products. I certainly will not do so again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Looked cool, but DOA
customer_reviews.text: Honeywell's customer service is garbage. I replaced my ac unit and this thermostat kept popping the fuze. I knew ac unit was going so I waited to install this until I got the new unit. I called and they said it was no longer under warranty based on the serial number but here is a 10% coupon. They said my particular unit was manufactured over a year ago. Money down the drain. Get a nest. Better warranty and many more features.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: WiFi thermostat
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit I purchased, due to the fact that Honeywell has been in the business of designing thermostats for a long time, so they have what it takes to design a solid reliable thermostat. I like this thermostat it is easy to setup ad use. I like the fact that there is an app on myiOS device to set the temperature remotely if needed. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is that this app has not changed since I bought my first unit several years ago, even though Honeywell is not a software company they should be able to get a new app design that is more updated.
customer_reviews.author: pacsailor

customer_reviews.title: Top Of The Line *****
customer_reviews.text: Good seller. Delivered as promised. T-stat is awesome. I've been in the HVAC industry for over 30 years and this is one of the nicest residential t-stats that I've ever used. Smooth operation from the minute I installed and powered it up. User friendly configuration and programming. User friendly period, and a very beautiful display. I'd even say classy. I chose this one over the other newer t-stats because it gives me more control over the system operation. But that's my personal preference. It's not as high tech as some of the others , but I prefer it that way. Hopefully less headaches and problems down the road. Honeywell quality. 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Honeywell Support!!! Buy another brand!
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the first 6-9 months. Then I lost the connection and ability to control from my phone, iPad, etc. This is 1300 miles from my primary home - that's a problem. Once I returned to the home, I tried to reconnect to no avail. I sent an email to Honeywell support - no response. I have called their 800# and it either says the number is no longer in service, or it just rings and rings. Don't buy it unless you are there to control it and then what would be the point? Try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: KeysGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works great -- and looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Works great -- and looks fantastic. I love that I can match the screen with the paint colors in the house. I have it communicating with my Amazon Echo and the Honeywell Android App which both work great (although I almost never use either option). The touch screen is great and super responsive. I love that if I alter a temperature from the schedule, the unit automatically sets a schedule override hold until the next scheduled segment. I don't have to worry about setting the schedule to resume at a certain time. This item is well worth it's purchase price & I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kdig14

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat! Nice interface and easy to program.
customer_reviews.text: Great thermostat! Nice interface and easy to program. Cuts the air on and off more logically than my last thermostat did. Automatic mode is great, set you min/max heat and ac level and either mode will automatically cut on to heat or cool. The smart phone (ios) app works flawlessly and with very little to no delay. Please note this unit REQUIRES the "C" wire (normally blue) to be connected to constant power, there are no batteries. There is an optional way to wire it if you don't have a C using the power off the G wire but than you can't run the fan independently which for me wouldn't be a good option.
customer_reviews.author: mikedhtristate

customer_reviews.title: We bought this thermostat approximately 1 year and 4 months ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this thermostat approximately 1 year and 4 months ago. I had an HVAC technician out yesterday because our blower was not working. He said that the issue is in the thermostat and that we will have to replace it. He called Honeywell for us, who said we had to call Amazon. Amazon said to call Honeywell. The warranty was only for a year so unfortunately neither of them are willing to do anything. We won't be re-purchasing from Honeywell that is for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Super easy to install. So nice to have an easy to adjust schedule (turn down heat at night, automatically up just before time to get up). Our old (non-smart) thermostat had this, but it was very cumbersome to set up. It's also great to check and adjust the thermostat while away from home. Initially, my only complaint was that it was so bright at night (installed in hallway outside bedroom door). However, after reading a the Q&A here on Amazon, I found that there is a dimming setting. Just search for "dim" in the Q&A.
customer_reviews.author: TV Technology

customer_reviews.title: NOT good for heat pump or geothermal
customer_reviews.text: If you have a heat pump or geothermal, this thermostat will run your aux heat on a normal basis every time the heat gets turned up. My electric bill has been 20 to 30 percent higher with this thermostat and there are no advanced settings to change it from running your aux heat all the time. Honeywell missed the mark on this one. Buy the Honeywell 8000 model if you have a heat pump or geothermal. Talked to Honeywell about this. The 9000 is meant for residential with no installer settings. The 8000 is more of a commercial unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would've spent my money on ANY other thermostat but this one
customer_reviews.text: So pissed I wasted my money on this thing and I'm past my 30 day return window. The wifi does not connect at all and when it does it will not STAY connected. Ugh! Should have bought the Nest like everyone else recommended I do. What a waste of money. Oh and don't try calling their 1800# unless you want to stay on hold for 30 min ++. What a damn joke. And to think Honeywell comes highly rated..
customer_reviews.author: Cutiecheeka99

customer_reviews.title: Starting to flake at 4 years old...
customer_reviews.text: This summer the thermostat is ignoring the schedule during daytime only. The error is that it's somehow setting itself as 2 to 4 degrees higher than programmed. Now I have to program my own schedule to do spot checks once or 2x a day around 11 or 12 noon to set it manually. What a bother ! I guess after 4 years - this is ok. Trying to reach their tech support. Will update review once I solve this.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C

customer_reviews.title: Spent $200 for a Great Product that only lasted 8 months the shorted out on a cold night!  :(
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product 8 months ago. It worked great and I loved the fact I could control the temp from my phone no matter where I was. After 8 months the product resets every time anything is pressed. Since this started at 11:00 p.m. on Easter we had to spend a very cold night without even Emergency Heat. This is very concerning as if it has developed a short could this start a fire? I will replace today (the day after Easter) with a different product from Best Buy. Not an Amazon issue - but I need it right now as I have pets and 62 degrees is a bit cold for my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects from SmartThings about once a month.
customer_reviews.text: Disconnects from SmartThings about once a month. I purchased this thermostat because I preferred the aesthetics over others on the market. However, about once a month (because of software updates I presume) it disconnects from SmartThings and I have to go through the painful process of reentering my Honeywell login information to get it back online. Additionally, as other reviewers have mentioned, the mounting bracket is poorly designed. You have a 50/50 chance that your thermostat will hang loosely because the bracket doesn't grab the thermostat well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon2222

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Restore WiFi Remotely
customer_reviews.text: Mostly this Thermostat is great. Great display, easy programming, easy installation (once you have a “C” wire. But if you plan to use it for remote monitoring, it has a MAJOR flaw. If you loose WiFi it fails to reconnect when WiFi is restored. Honeywell can help you reconnect them, but only if someone is home. That means no info and no control. If you were planning to restore normal heat for your return home, get ready to be cold. For me this is inexcusable.
customer_reviews.author: MaineBill

customer_reviews.title: I love this thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermostat. It looks clean and refined. It was easy to install however as others have noted you may have to mess with the mounting tabs in order for it to hold secure to the wall. Also, after install and registering the unit, it did an update from Honeywell. It was after this update the unit would not display outside weather information. After reviewing some comments online some had said it will come back after about 7 hours. Well, 7 hours later it came back. It would just be nice if Honeywell provided some information that after the update this may be a possibility.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: Honeywell web support has gone way down hill in the last year. Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: OK, the basic product seems to be very good - - we've been using it for several years now. In the last year the Honeywell web site supporting these has been down A LOT!! At this point, I'd have to say that you should NOT buy one of these. Very frustrating. No way to contact Honeywell. Overall, this product used to be a good choice, but based on the last year's experience this just sucks. Sorry, but that's the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: M. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Poor WiFi Reliability
customer_reviews.text: I like most of this thermostat EXCEPT it's wifi reliability is terrible. It constantly (weekly?) loses its wifi signal whether or not the power went out. It might reconnect days later if at all. We use it at a vacation property to heat the place up before arrival. I bought a second more expensive wifi model (this one) after I had the same problem with the basic wifi model. I expected Honeywell to be much better. Clearly this product is not ready for prime time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Thankfully was easy to install (I did have a C wire available that I just had to connect on both ends). Love having an iPhone app. Setup and making schedules was piece of cake. The only think that's a bummer is that tbe screen is not capacitive touch. It's old school pressure touch. But oh well works perfectly fine for what it does. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: n8tr

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I had an HVAC buddy come over and make sure I had a "C" wire so this would work. I installed the stat, easy to do, and programed it in Auto mode. It does what I wanted. I set the heat so doesn't get below 71 degrees F and cooling so it doesn't get above 74 degrees F. Simple to raise or lower temporarily, when the weather gets to where it stays cold, I'll shift it over to heat only. I bought 2 other stats, both Honeywell's, but this is the one that is the easiest and works the best. Glad I spent the money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wi-Fi Radio failure and Honeywell won't replace. Look at another product  besides Honeywell.
customer_reviews.text: NOT A QUALITY PRODUCT - do not buy. I purchased this two years ago and there is a message on the display saying that the Wi-Fi radio isn't working. I checked everything and it's definitely a failure of the thermostat. Not sure if it's a hardware malfunction or if it was a software update from Honeywell that turned it into a brick. Honeywell pushes all updates. Honeywell won't replace this after the 1 year warranty so goodbye $177.00. Note that the thermostat still works but not remotely with an app. I recommend another product. (Mine is pretty secure right now however.)
customer_reviews.author: CDs4Movies

customer_reviews.title: Sold a used or reconditioned product JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely sent a used product that had been returned. When I got into the programming part of the installation the thermostat had already been named(too late for me to take it down and return it). I didn’t find out until the first heatwave here on why it was returned...the port for the wire that turns the AC on doesn’t work. I have 3 of the exact models, tested out another one up there and it works fine. Basically I have a unit that can only heat.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof6plus2

customer_reviews.title: Too many wifi issues with this unit to be useful as anything but a dumb thermostat.
customer_reviews.text: The tech issues with this unit are MANY. Random issues with wifi, regardless of 2.4 GHZ band (will not work with modern 5G wifi bands). No other device in the house has these issues, to include my smart plugs. When connected, it only randomly shows the weather. Randomly works via the internet. It works fine as a dumb thermostat. Nothing more. I wholly regret making this purchase. I should have bought a Nest for the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Rock Solid Performance
customer_reviews.text: Although expensive, this thermostat performs perfectly. In the three years I've had it (and three others in different zones) it has never failed. We travel and often will be away for weeks. Being able to see the house temperature during extremely cold or hot weather is a valuable asset. You can change heat or air conditioning settings, lock them down or shut the system off and turn on when needed. A particularly good feature is the ability of the thermostat to send an email or text if temperature parameters that you've set are violated. The only caveat toward remotely controlling it is the stability of your router and your service provider.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Gauger

customer_reviews.title: It works, but it is not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this unit for less than two years, and it recently began reporting our indoor humidity quite inaccurately (6-8% lower than actual level). I contacted Honeywell customer "service" and received this reply: "RTH9580WF does not have the feature of controlling humidity from the thermostat, it just displays the humidity settings on it. There is no option to calibrate the humidity settings on the thermostat. This thermostat can display 5-6 degrees off when compared to a hygrometer. You may get the unit replaced from the place of purchase, however it will display an off of 5-6 degrees." Be advised, it is inaccurate, and Honeywell will do nothing about it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb & Paul

customer_reviews.title: Seemless Integration
customer_reviews.text: This has been hands down the best item I've bought to date. I no longer have to wait for the heater to warm up my house or the AC to cool. I programmed my schedule online and downloaded the app, now my house is the perfect temperature when I walk through the door! I can easily change the schedule from the app or online. My bills have changed drastically since I purchased these for upstairs and downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: C Bear

customer_reviews.title: Wrong temp readings
customer_reviews.text: I'm reading that many people are having issues with this thermostat not registering an accurate indoor temperature. Well after 3yrs of ownership we to are having the same problem. It will read 2-3 degrees less than what is actually in the room. I'll pull the thermostat off the wall and put it right bck on and then it will match the room temp.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Suss

customer_reviews.title: The WiFi on this sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved the product, but the WiFi adapter built into this thermostat sucks. The first one I bought had a wifi adapter that failed after a few months. I was able to send it back, but the second is starting to have severe wifi issues now also. I have been troubleshooting it's connectivity for several weeks now and have determined that the internal wifi adapter just blows. I'm pretty bummed out though because their app is great when the thermostat is connected to the wifi and it's convenient to use, but unfortunately it has serious issues connecting and staying connected to the wifi.
customer_reviews.author: ty brown

customer_reviews.title: He said it is very common for him to get calls for programming all smart thermometers. I will say he said this Honeywell ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars out of 5 because programming it wasn’t the easiest - some of the questions are confusing So when it wasn’t working properly I had to call my A/C company out to program it for me. He said it is very common for him to get calls for programming all smart thermometers. I will say he said this Honeywell is a much better option than the nest especially if you already have a Honeywell - the wiring is the same and easy to set up. Going to a nest if not done properly can cause you to blow a fuse on your unit. Now that’s it’s working on my schedule - I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these thermostats in different houses 1 of them I have had for 6 years and the other 2 years. I have never had a problem with either of them. They have both always stayed connected to the wifi and have always worked correctly. One of them is connected using comcast and the other using suddenlink. I do not know if this makes a difference with connection but both are used with the modem/router that the providers provided.One of them is used with a heat pump system and the other one is used with a regular system. I would buy this thermostat again if I ever need too.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. RN

customer_reviews.title: Best Thermostat I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Following the excellent instructions, I installed and set this thermostat up in 45 minutes including having to hook up the blue wire in the wire bundle in my wall to not only the C connector in the thermostat, but also to the C connector on my furnace control board. This unit came up right away and following the easy instructions I got it connected to my router LAN and the internet and set all the programming in it for our liking. So far after 2 days of operation it has performed flawlessly. Alexa also likes this thermostat and controls it with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil D. Langham

customer_reviews.title: So far it's awesome!  Easy to use features and App
customer_reviews.text: First week with my new WIFI Thermostat and I can't stop showing people how awesome it is! Easy instalation with Youtube videos to help you if you don't have the C wire connected to your old thermostat. The scheduling feature can be done through the App which made for easy set up. I can check it from work and make sure the house isn't getting too hot/cold. seeing the humidity levels and outside temp is a cool feature too. the App is simple to use and makes it easy to make sure the house is a the proper tempurature before I head home! I bought the wall plate to go with it, which made it look better on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, simple, easy
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit. I wanted one to set a schedule on. I did not want one to "learn" my preferences. This one connects to the internet and does exactly what I wanted. Simple, sleek, stylish and works like a champ. I had a little trouble installing it. The blue or black wire was the main power wire, I just had to connect it to power in the air handler unit. If you have 5 wires behind existing unit, you will be fine. Added a photo for size comparison. I'm a big guy soo do the math. It's small, but I like the small wall footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: I own this Honeywell and Nest thermostats on different properties ...
customer_reviews.text: I own this Honeywell and Nest thermostats on different properties. I prefer the Honeywell. The only draw back is that the thermostat cannot be programmed to switch automatically from cooling to heating or heating to cooling. Update: Doing research online found out that my mechanical contractor was incorrect. If you go to menu, preferences, advanced preferences, select next, then select Automatic. If you do this, from the systems menu you can have automatic change over. Raised to 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Chris NY

customer_reviews.title: 5 star thermostat
customer_reviews.text: For anyone in the market for a wifi thermostat, look no further. I purchased two of these for my home and I absolutely love them. I have it connected with my echo and it works well with that also. Interface is easy to use and set up takes only 15 minutes tops. Even has a clean mode that shuts off the display for a short amount of time to allow you to touch and clean it without messing up your settings. Best of all, it's about $80 cheaper than the Nest one and I like the fact you can change the display color. Measures 4.5" x 3.5" but the touch display is really responsive and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. O

customer_reviews.title: so good. I purchased this to control a second home ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I purchased this to control a second home hvac. Already have a similar Honeywell unit that requires RedLink. The only negative is our RedLink unit has an outside temperature sensor that gives us accurate temps at the house. This one is online to a nearby (in our case....not so nearby) weather station. We couldn't find a similar compatible temp sensor for this unit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment amd will pay it self in electric bill ...
customer_reviews.text: Great investment amd will pay it self in electric bill saving. Easy to program the schedule amd the ability to control from any computer or mobile device is even better. The ability to control your AC for does unexpected changes of your day. Both the screen menu and the app menu are extremely easy to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Roman

customer_reviews.title: Installed in just a few minutes, seems to work like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: We love the small footprint for this thermostat. We replaced an older Honeywell that was more than 2x the size. The app for Android and iOS are flawless in controlling the HVAC. Its simple and intuitive and installed in just a few minutes. We were looking at the NEST and a couple of other devices, but frankly, this one seemed the most highly reviewed and displayed the information in a logical and easy to read format. Changing the colors of the background is a little clunky, but don't let that sway you into NOT buying. A+ for simple and effective control. If we needed a 2nd thermostat, we'd buy another.
customer_reviews.author: angela impellizzeri

customer_reviews.title: Costermer service
customer_reviews.text: I recently loss internet service and my connection to the thermostat was also loss my service came back and so did the thermostat connection to the internet , But I can no longer connect my phone to the Thermostat I have tried to contact Honeywell both by phone and by E-mail with no luck and that is the reason I am giving them a 1 I would never buy another Honeywell product again. I changed my rating from 1 to 4 after making this review I was able to resolve my issue with my thermostat if I did not have so many problems with contacting Honeywell they would have gotten a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: thought it was great. Then my electric bill arrives
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thermostat and installed it about a month ago, thought it was great. Then my electric bill arrives, and it's double what it should be. I started closely monitoring the thermostat, and discovered my auxiliary heat was running almost constantly, even when the house temperature matched the set temperature. Figuring the thermostat had been installed incorrectly or was defective, I called a HVAC repairman. Turns out the thermostat WAS defective, and had a bad temperature sensor. I returned the thermostat, but I'm still out the excessive amount on the electric bill plus the $100 HVAC service charge. I won't be reordering this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Change your house temp on your cell phone!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I love this thermostat in my lake house, this device allows me to change the temperature in the house so it is nice and cool or warm when I get there. They also started sending me energy usage reports which are really interesting, it compares the energy you used compared to last year and it shows you the weather so you can take that into account. I.E. you could be using more energy but it was hotter this year. Overall great device!!
customer_reviews.author: Ammoshot

customer_reviews.title: WiFi frustrations
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thermostat. Connecting it to WIFI is the most frustrating thing I have ever done. The password is correct but it just doesn't connect and each time you try it takes minutes to determine if the entry will work or not. Doesn't seem like much but 5 tries later and you want to throw it out the window. When you finally reconnect it, it then requires that you delete your registration of it with the app, and re register. This devices connectivity process needs to be seriously re thought. I have quit using it connected as it just isnt worth redoing it every time a storm knocks the internet offline.
customer_reviews.author: DW xcoustic

customer_reviews.title: Nice thermostat, works great with Alexa and Google Home
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to upgrade our existing system in order to use voice controls. We have used this with both Amazon Alexa and Google Home and it has worked great with both. Never has any connection issues and always reconnects automatically and successfully whenever the network drops. Having the color display options is a nice added bonus. Programming and menu options are clear and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and Honeywell support is excellent
customer_reviews.text: as advertised... no surprises, easy to use and Honeywell support is excellent. When you can no longer connect for whatever reason and you get "403- Forbidden Access denied" you are screwed. No help on their site. Customer service phone walks you through a few steps to connect to the appropriate person, than disconnects you, "Due to high Volume" "Goodbye"!!!!!! Customer service needs some work....after all this product is all about remote access........
customer_reviews.author: John M Grzeskowski

customer_reviews.title: Sysytem not a match
customer_reviews.text: We bought this , hoping it would be an easy install. Turned out we didn't have the key wire - and our wi-fi is spotty at best, and THAT is what the thermostat runs on. I've waited 4 "business days" for the seller to issue a return slip so that I can return it, but they have been a little slow about that. I was not real impressed with the look of this, either. It looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: KMP50

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile network connection
customer_reviews.text: A couple of days ago, I reset the modem (per cable provider request). I awoke next morning to find 14 communication failure alerts in my email. None of the other smart products in my house had any difficulty reconnecting. I have not yet succeeded in reestablishing contact, despite multiple attempts at disconnecting/reconnecting and re-registering thermostat, cycling power, cycling wireless network, etc. Today my attempts to log on to my account are met with "Unexpected Error" message (without further explanation). In general, the connection seems unstable, with occasional inabilities to control the device from my phone app. No other devices on my mesh wi-fi network show any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Wecnes

customer_reviews.title: Great home upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. The phone app makes it so you can set it from any room in the house. Install went pretty easy. There was a unused common wire (C-Wire) already installed. One thing that did set me back about 30 minutes is there was a auto shutoff on my furnace that cut the power if the maintenance control door was open. I didn't figure that out until I was watching a video on YouTube trying to figure out why it wasn't getting power and knew I installed it correctly. Soon as I closed that door everything powered right up.
customer_reviews.author: The Amazon Family

customer_reviews.title: Love the look/features/simplicity.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when expected. Had read several reviews and liked the price. Read the instructions several times (even before it arrived) thanks to a visit to the Honeywell website. Only took about 20 minutes to install (couple trips up and down the stairs, powering off/on the breaker, connecting the C terminal in furnace that wasn't previously connected). I'd also already set up an account on mytotalcomfort.com to be ready to get the system up and running via the apps/web. Love it. all works as advertised so far. App even lets you make changes to the system using voice commands. 5 stars for now. Will update if something warranting a change happens.
customer_reviews.author: kenmig

customer_reviews.title: A few years later and this guy is working great - really useful when you want to update the ...
customer_reviews.text: A few years later and this guy is working great - really useful when you want to update the schedule, or change temp on the fly. Phone app works really well and never had any issues with connectivity. Has worked flawlessly for memoir a few years now - highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: wastedwhiskey

customer_reviews.title: Works for me just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned re others response because I purchased this to interface with echo. I spoke with Amazon (call centers are really hit and miss, I would give them just 2 stars!) and finally spoke with Honeywell and was convinced that this would work for me. Installed in about 30 minutes but I already had developed a map of the wires from my conversation with Honeywell. I set up an account with same and the WiFi was straight forward. So far I am very pleased although in two days they have already reduced the price 5 dollars. But worth the cost. I can verbally turn the heat on before I get out of bed!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Display
customer_reviews.text: Excellent thermostat for its bright, clear, informative display and ease of setup. One very disappointing aspect however is the lack of technical support from Honeywell since this Pro unit is intended for professional installation and not for consumer installation. You save on the upfront cost and gain an extend five-year warranty, but you sacrifice telephone technical support for the savings. Also, initially the display would occasionally lose the programmed color scheme and default to very light blue with black lettering. Luckily, I have not seen this happen since using the thermostat now for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great at first
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat was wonderful at first. It looked nice and I could remotely adjust the temperature. After about 6 months the device started having trouble connecting to wifi, after a year it is offline more than online. The outer framing casing is also starting to come off from the unit.
customer_reviews.author: JennaF

customer_reviews.title: Has a good range of features appropriate for use in our small ...
customer_reviews.text: 1/04/18 - received the new unit on a timely basis and found the product to be accurately described. Has a good range of features appropriate for use in our small business, with an easy learning curve. Have used this new smart thermostat for over 30 days and found it to be operating appropriately. This unit is a good price to value deal. TKs ! RB
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great tstat but this one is not DYI  warrantied .
customer_reviews.text: In other words Honeywell markets the thermostats in this line to commercial contractors cheaper than those to DIY installers. In other words DIY installers cost Honeywell more money to troubleshoot. In other words this is a commercial contractor product and the warranty is void if you’re a DIY installer
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat is awesome. It has all of the programming function that I have come to expect, but using the WiFi app, I really don't have the need for the "fixed" programming. I can check the house temperature, turn the system on and off, and adjust heat or cooling temperatures from literately anywhere in the world with my phone. The house is always exactly the right temperature when we return home from long weekends or vacations without the need to maintain temperatures while we are away. Installation was very easy following Honeywell's online video instruction and the whole install took less than an hour to complete. This thermostat even has display screens configurable that match the color of your walls!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: There's a great Honeywell video on YouTube explaining it
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure others have mentioned this ... but if you don't have a "C wire" at your thermostat, you're going to have to do about 10 minutes of extra work. There's a great video Honeywell on YouTube explaining it. Link below:  You have to use the G wire as your C wire, and do some easy wiring changes at your furnace as well. Nothing too difficult in my opinion. You lose your ability to manually turn on your fan though. If this is a deal-breaker to you, you should be looking for a battery powered thermostat, and not a hard-wired wifi version. The thermostat itself works great, and easy to control with the phone app too if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and setup
customer_reviews.text: The installation instructions were simple, but easy to understand. It only took a few minutes to wire the whole thing up. I have had the unit installed for a few years now and it works very well. I love being able to control the temperature from my phone so I can set the temp before I get home. I had to create an account with Honeywell to use these features. They send you a report every month after a year or so to compare your energy usage from the same time in the previous year which is good to know.
customer_reviews.author: chilie

customer_reviews.title: Great product but used unit sold as new by vendor
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We have 2 which work as expected. Love the ability to control and monitor temperatures from my phone. However when we ordered a third unit it was not only used but broken despite wiki deals saying the unit was new. So while I would say the unit was a 5 star, selling a used unit as new drops the rating down to 1. However, due to the way Amazon is handling the return I will compromise on a 3 since I can’t find a way to simply warn about our experience with wiki deals.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Needs a lot more app development.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is easy to install and use. I'd like it to be a little bigger. Overall I like this thermostat but sometimes I feel the temp is off. More importantly is the lack off the app. Yes you can control it from your phone, but the one thing i think it lacks is the ability to see how long the as or Furnace has ran. This can be helpful will saving money. I have reached out to them with my input and no reply. This is not a new thing. My old thermostat did this. Customer service lacks.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty J

customer_reviews.title: Worked for almost 3 years!
customer_reviews.text: worked good for almost 3 years and the wireless card went and there was no way to by pass the wireless connection. Causing it not to work. Honey was not helpful and told me I am out of luck since the warranty expired. Mean while it work out the wireless connection but there no way turn the feature off! So approx. a 200.00 product become a paper weight. Totally unhappy and will never Honeywell there thermostat again!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable after 1.5 years of use multiple issues
customer_reviews.text: After over a year of owning this I love the wifi feature, however the unit has frozen multiple times and today it had a blank screen and the house was very hot. I unseated and reseated it and it's working again but I would not recommend it to anyone especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Aux Heat Software logic terrible
customer_reviews.text: Thermostat has been installed for 8 months. In the past, my electric bill has been considered an efficient home. Over the past few months I’ve noticed my bill continuously drifting up. My December bill was twice as much as last year. Turns out, the thermostat always uses heat strips to heat the house by more than 2 degrees. According to Honeywell, this is a “feature” to ensure user “comfort”. Not efficient at all! Has probably cost me $1000 extra in electric this year. Honeywell has a serious flaw in the software and acknowledges it. Better off buying a Nest or Ecobee.
customer_reviews.author: ABaum

customer_reviews.title: Nice Thermostat But Not For Us
customer_reviews.text: As the rating states it is an okay thermostat. Great looking with many nice features. Enjoyed the wireless connection. Unfortunately, I had to return this thermostat. The room temperature indicated was not correct, verified by a few accurate thermometers. With all the great features this may work for you, but unfortunately it was not for us.
customer_reviews.author: WJW

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with how this thermostat works. The touch screen is very responsive, and using the app on a smart phone to set a schedule is very easy to do. The integration to show outside temp is very helpful, along with the ability to change the color theme to match the room that it's in. Wiring it up is also very easy - just make sure you document your current wiring!! It also has helpful reminders for replacing your filter - and does it based on USAGE not just time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kline

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I've owned it for over a year and a half and it is one of my favorite purchases. It has only lost it's wifi connection twice. It is simple to setup and very easy to use. I get a monthly update by email that shows how much heating and cooling hours used for the month and compares it to the last year. If it goes out today, I would buy it again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Worst Thermostat I've ever had!! Lasted 1.5 years!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thermostat in August of 2015. I installed it in September of 2015. In January of 2017, the screen became almost illegible, very hard to read. Since then it has become worse, can hardly read screen to reset thermostat!! I contacted the Honeywell warranty department regarding the failure of this thermostat. They said they will not replace or repair this thermostat as it has only a 1 year warranty. So now I will need to spend another $200- or so for a replacement thermostat and it will not be a Honeywell!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Rahfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Pop-up ads in the app for a thermostat I paid for?  Nope.
customer_reviews.text: A perfectly adequate programmable thermostat. But sticking pop-up ads in the control application is unacceptable. The app was great but sometime in late 2018 they added pop-up advertising to it, so now if I go to check or change the thermostat I have to click through 1-3 pop-ups. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: A. Listener

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to adjust the heat and fan right from my phone. I also love that I can get alerted on certain conditions. I live in Colorado where it's very dry so I set a low humidity alert. The only thing I wish it did was have usage graphs you can view for the time period I chose. I get an email once a month with the data so I know it's tracked somewhere, I just wish I had access when I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband had bought a new thermostat at a store. After trying to install it he needed assistance and the only way to get a hold of the company was through email. He was told that he would need to return it to the store. He asked me to check amazon and see if we could get another one from them since that was the last one at the store. After reading the reviews I started looking at other thermostats. This one was very easy to install and has all the features and more then the other one. Works like it should and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Deana H

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this series anymore
customer_reviews.text: First, the temp reading is off unless you keep the backlight off all the time. By default, the backlight will dim. Even in the dim mode, it warms up the whole module and your temp reading will be wrong. Also: don’t buy this series anymore. Buy a newer model. They are no longer updating this. It won’t conmect to Wink (it does but it won’t work, it says the thermostat is offline.) Honeywell has not updated the phone app nor the Wink issue for years now. It’s barely supporting ios12 now (with a half cut screen) Soon, the app will no longer open.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good features but Poor Value! Died after 24 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Great features. It has exactly what I want but it only has a one year warranty and mine stopped working after 24 months. I called Honeywell and they suggested I buy a new one. I will buy another Brand from now on. I expect my thermostat to last longer than it did and I will not risk the next Honeywell model which only has a one year warranty as well. Honeywell has lost me a customer from this point on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works okay, not that great
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat works pretty well and the large screen enable you to see all temperatures without having to go through menus like the Nest. I've had some issues with the display time to time where it goes to white and had horizontal lines, but goes back to normal once you touch it. I'm not a big fan of Honeywell's Android app, has annoy ads and could be designed better.
customer_reviews.author: Doan

customer_reviews.title: Great colorful Wi-Fi thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Lennox ComfortSense 7000 thermostat (no color screen or Wi-Fi) with this Honeywell RTH9580WF Wi-Fi color screen thermostat. I have a Lennox XC21 air conditioner and a SL280V gas heater controlled by this thermostat. The Honeywell was easy to install as the wires, C, Y, W, G, and R from the old thermostat were all reused. I love the Wi-Fi remote capabilities, colorful screen in which several color options are available, and its accurate clock that sync over the Internet. It's much quieter than the Lennox thermostat as I barely hear the clicking of its relay. The price was also much cheaper than the Lennox Wi-Fi thermostat that I originally was thinking of getting.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Would rate it 10 stars if it were larger!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much easier to program than the regular Honeywell. I had the less expensive one and it was a real pain to program. This one I have on wifi and do it from my computer. It can also be programed manually, but why would you want to do that when it is much more convenient on the Computer or smartphone. Only Con, and I did not subtract stars for this, is that I think it would rate 10 stars if it were just a tad larger. As one gets older even with prescription glasses these small size thermostats are almost impossible to read.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy from Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wifi thermostat.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old programmable thermostat with this one. I ended up pulling a new thermostat wire because my old one didn't have enough wires to be able to do fan control. So far I have this working with voice commands with the Amazon echo via IFTTT. And through my homeseer system. The Honeywell app also makes it easy to control from your phone or tablet. When I wake up in the night hot, no more getting out of bed and walking downstairs to turn the AC down a couple degrees!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bramlage

customer_reviews.title: Very good temperature control
customer_reviews.text: After several years of dealing with an older Honeywell digital thermostat (circa 1997), I installed this one. My unit has a heat pump so I needed to call the support line to deal with the wiring/conversion from the old to new thermostat, but it was very easy once they told me what to do with my "extra" wire. Now that it's installed, we are very happy with it. No more occasional odd behaviors with the heater or AC not shutting off once the preset temperature is reached. Our split level home now maintains a consistent temperature better than ever. Based upon the last 3 months of operation our monthly electric bills seem to be lower too!
customer_reviews.author: Gus J Calapristi

customer_reviews.title: Good good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thermostat. It was installed in less than 20min. Pros: 1. Looks 2. Easy to program 3. Easy install 4. Online interface Cons: 1. Setting time drove me nuts until I saw the one line that stated that if registered online the clock must be set online 2. No Z-Wave, yes this not a feature but it would round it out. Overall, I am thinking of getting another for my other thermostat and completely circumventing my Tuxedo from Honeywell.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer2003

customer_reviews.title: For Old Units, you may have to substitute C wire with a G wire
customer_reviews.text: Installed it yesterday to an old conventional system and it works. My only worry is my heating bill, so in the spring I'll have to update my hvac unit. The biggest challenge was that I didn't have a "C" connection with the old thermostat. Thank goodness for the honeywell website, in which a video instructed me to substitute the C for a G wire (that my old conventional unit has) on the thermostat. When doing that, you must also take the G wire on the on your old "unit" and move it to C. (sounds confusing but it's really easy)
customer_reviews.author: Blackhorse 20

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to use. We've had it installed for a couple of months now and it is good at keeping the temperature steady in uneven Seattle area conditions. The iPhone interface is very easy to connect and gives great flexibility. We work at home and are here almost all the time, so I have used the programming features, but everything else has worked well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Red Ryder

customer_reviews.title: ... time on this product really is not efficient nor good for any HVAC system
customer_reviews.text: Cycle time on this product really is not efficient nor good for any HVAC system. +/- 1/2F is the variance of this thermometer... With the thermostat set at 78F with an outside temp of 93F 70% humidity, our AC cycled on and off every 10 minutes. Exchanged this thermostat back to our old Hunter thermostat, cycle time changed from 35 mins on and 45 mins off. Less ware and tear on our AC unit.
customer_reviews.author: StacyZ

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my dual stage thermostat with a new one because it would not shut off the air conditioner. I think it had something to do the humidity control in the thermostat that I had. Bought this one. Installed in 20 minutes. Worked perfectly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No product support from Resideo Honeywell for broken product
customer_reviews.text: The product had a year warranty. 9 months after installing, I decide to use the WiFi. Doesn't work. Honeywell admit the product is defective. On Dec 10, promise to send a replacement. A month later, and 6 phone calls and 3 emails later, still have no replacement. They don't return phone calls, don't solve problems and pretend their headphones don't work or put you on hold for 20 minutes without returning if you ask for a supervisor. Faulty products and FAKE customer support employees. DON"T buy Anything from Honeywell.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: I really like this!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this and I just love it. Very simple to use, no learning curve what so ever. I love that I can turn the temp up and down from my phone. When i leave the house and forget to turn down the temp, I just do it from the phone and then turn it back up 15 minutes before I return home. I come and go at different times everyday so I didn't really want one that learns like the nest. This has been perfect for us. I also like the custom colors features. It was easy to install, well for my maintenance guy it was.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install.
customer_reviews.text: Have an oil furnace due to house being built in the 1950's. Couldn't install it and my contractor neighbor couldn't install it. Had professionals Come out and say that the device was defective. Going to just order through the professionals and not Amazon next time. Save yourself the headache! Sent it back within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work correctly.
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat constantly turns off and restarts will it is trying to run the heater. Noticed several complaints for the same issue. Also Pavilion Electronics told me that they only warranty for 30 days so I would have to get a hold of Honeywell; Honeywell has told me that I have to work with the company that I bought it from and Pavilion Electronics tells me that they don't even have the unit in stock anymore so there isn't anything they can do. They don't seem very interested in helping the customer and I would never recommend purchasing anything from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: So installation was a nightmare, had to hire someone ($180), but I'm not sure this was the thermostat's fault as much as it was my builder's fault. Anyway, interface is very nice, app could be a little better designed (you have to go to the website to make an account, but the app doesn't link to the website or give you the option to make one from the app, which I found strange). Haven't had any problems since it got installed. Even synced up to Alexa without much if a problem. Correction, it did NOT sync up to Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Excellent thermostat
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Installation went flawlessly. I didn't have a C wire, only had a white, yellow, red, and green connecting to my old circle shaped thermostat. However, did have three extra wires in the harness, so connected the blue one to C terminal on the furnace circuit board, then to C connection on this new thermostat. Honeywell has a video on their site showing how this is done. Remainder of installation including the wi fi connection worked perfect. Really like the looks of the thermostat, including the outside temperature and humidity readout. Getting $40 rebate from our utility company for installation of this thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Meister

customer_reviews.title: Saves money left and right, very easy to use and wire up.
customer_reviews.text: This has been great. I am now lazier than ever with the ability to remotely control my home temperature from any smartphone or web browser. The interface is easy and slick, and knowing the indoor humidity is very helpful. It controls the temperature in my home tightly (within 1F). It pays for itself over time with energy savings, but it also pays for itself by reminding me when to change the air filter every 30 "air days." This is typically every 6 months because our system might be off during spring/fall while the windows are open. So now I'm saving around $30/yr by not over-changing my house air filter.
customer_reviews.author: Vitreous

customer_reviews.title: It's very modern looking with a great display, and is user friendly and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a replacement thermostat for ours that quit working. We had never used a Honeywell product before, but we're impressed by both the design and how well it works. It's very modern looking with a great display, and is user friendly and easy to navigate. It works well for our needs and I would look to Honeywell in the future should this one need to be replaced in a few years. Also, we love that there's an app you can download to your phone and connect to this unit. It makes it easy to adjust temperatures to have the house ready when you're leaving for work or gone on a trip. Great feature.
customer_reviews.author: lavanda brown

customer_reviews.title: ADJUST YOUR HOME TEMP REMOTELY
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thermostat for those of us who need to control the HVAC remotely via mobile phone (when my 90-yr old mother is cold and doesn't know how to adjust it, for example). She simply calls me and I can make the adjustment from anywhere (including from my bed if the temp needs adjusting)....pretty cool! I highly recommend it. I did ask my HVAC company to install it ($150).
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a second unit for my home in the UP of Michigan. I wanted to be able to remotely change the temperature in each of my homes so that when I am travelling, I can adjust accordingly. The fact that you can see multiple locations on the same login screen is great. The only thing I would suggest to make this even better is to have the outside temperature available for both locations on the login screen. The current feature only shows the temperature of the first installed thermostat. I love the quality and the ability to change the color of the screen based on whatever color my wife fancies that week.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: I like the dashboard display and the changeable color screen to ...
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat works very well. I like the dashboard display and the changeable color screen to blend in or accent the wall color. The Honeywell app has worked every time. I have mine tied into Amazon Echo and responds to voice commands within seconds. It has a temperature offset to calibrate to the actual room temperature, however mine was correct from the factory. I also like that it pulls your local weather and gives you outside temp. and humidity. I recommend this thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Sz

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: It technically works great. However, my previous thermostat (another brand) would automatically switch from heating to cooling when needed. This will not. By now, I think thermostats should have that as a standard feature. I guess I should have researched this better, but as I said, that should be standard.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Was Great While It Lasted
customer_reviews.text: This was the second of three of this style Honeywell t-stat I have purchased and it might be the last. Right around a year and four months it has started circling the drain. It randomly resets (screen goes black and reboots). So now I am left with t-stat that is trash because it is well known Honeywell will not do anything after a year (and reading reviews it sounds like its questionable if they will do anything during the first year). I a very disappointed because I just installed a second one in my workshop and don't want to have two different apps for the t-stats in my house if I go with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Machine_Maker

product_meta.title: Honeywell RTH9580WF Wi-Fi Smart Touchscreen Thermostat, Silver
product_meta.description:
Honeywell Wi-Fi Smart Thermostat, Control from anywhere, via iPhone, iPad, Android and computer.The extreme flexibility of the Honeywell Wi-Fi smart thermostat allows you to uniquely program your device as either a home or business thermostat and then offers scheduling features specific to your home or business.For a business, simply select the temperature that you prefer when the building is occupied, and you won't have to worry about cold mornings or hot afternoons.You can also select the temperature that you prefer when your business is unoccupied, so you won't have to worry about wasting energy.Tell your Wi-Fi smart thermostat what temperature you prefer when you wake, and you'll never have to endure another cold morning. Smart Response Technology for 24-7 ComfortThis smart thermostat even learns your heating and cooling cycle times to deliver just the right temperature, right when you want it.The Honeywell Wi-Fi smart thermostat learns the exact amount of time necessary to reach your perfect temperature and acts accordingly, so energy isn't wasted and your comfort isn't compromised.otal Connect Comfort AppHoneywell's reliable and highly-rated app allows you to program your thermostat from your computer, tablet, and smartphone, whether you're across the room or around the world. This allows the user to remotely monitor and manage home's comfort and energy usage anytime, anywhereThis highly rated app is backed by Honeywell's reliable network, for dependable access and peace of mind. Available for iOS and Android devices. Auto AlertsExtreme temperature alerts and filter change reminders are sent to connected network devices and displayed on Honeywell Wi-Fi smart thermostat.

AMAZON.COM


WI-FI SMART THERMOSTAT FROM HONEYWELL
SMART FEATURES, CUSTOMIZABLE TOUCHSCREEN, AND SIMPLE SETUP, PLUS WI-FI REMOTE ACCESS.
 • Control from anywhere with iOS and Android devices

 • Simple setup with smart programmable features for home or business

 • Easy-to-read customizable color touchscreen

 • Smart Response temperature timing

 • Advanced fan/comfort control and indoor humidity sensor

* Compatible with thermostats with 110V or higher and systems containing a c-wire (see chart below to determine compatibility)

SMART PROGRAMMABLE FEATURES
SMART, FLEXIBLE SCHEDULING
The extreme flexibility of the Honeywell Wi-Fi smart thermostat allows you to uniquely program your device as either a home or business thermostat and then offers scheduling features specific to your home or business. 

For a business, simply select the temperature that you prefer when the building is occupied, and you won't have to worry about cold mornings or hot afternoons.

You can also select the temperature that you prefer when your business is unoccupied, so you won't have to worry about wasting energy.

Tell your Wi-Fi smart thermostat what temperature you prefer when you wake, and you'll never have to endure another cold morning.

SMART RESPONSE TECHNOLOGY FOR 24-7 COMFORT
This smart thermostat even learns your heating and cooling cycle times to deliver just the right temperature, right when you want it.

The Honeywell Wi-Fi smart thermostat learns the exact amount of time necessary to reach your perfect temperature and acts accordingly, so energy isn't wasted and your comfort isn't compromised.



RELIABLE WI FI OPERATION AND CONTROL
TOTAL CONNECT COMFORT APP
Honeywell's reliable and highly-rated app allows you to program your thermostat from your computer, tablet, and smartphone, whether you're across the room or around the world. This allows the user to remotely monitor and manage home's comfort and energy usage anytime, anywhere

This highly rated app is backed by Honeywell's reliable network, for dependable access and peace of mind. Available for iOS and Android devices.

AUTO ALERTS
Extreme temperature alerts and filter change reminders are sent to connected network devices and displayed on Honeywell Wi-Fi smart thermostat.



ADVANCED COMFORT AND CONTROL FEATURES
CUSTOMIZABLE COLOR TOUCHSCREEN
Easily change the high-definition display to any color you choose. The bright, easy-to-read touchscreen can be color customized to fit your mood, match your paint, or support your favorite team!

LOCKING TOUCHSCREEN
Advanced locking features and password options provide smart security and convenience. Optional password protection allows only designated users to access the security settings and locking options. A 30-second lockout affords you the opportunity to clean the thermostat, so you don't have to live with fingerprints on your touchscreen device.

ON-SCREEN COMFORT INFORMATION
See indoor and outdoor temperature and humidity information right on the home screen.

INDOOR HUMIDITY SENSOR
Indoor humidity displayed below temparture on touchscreen

ADVANCED FAN/CONTROL COMFORT
Improves air circulation and helps regulate the temperature throughout your home

SIMPLE PROGRAMMING
Tool-free wiring, manual-free install and setup

ENERGY SAVINGS
Choose programmable mode to save on annual heating and cooling costs

HOME COMPATIBILITY
Compatible with heating, cooling and heat pumps.

Does not work with heat pumps with electric baseboard heat (120-240 volts)

In order to power your Honeywell Wi-Fi smart thermostat (RTH9580WF), your system must contain a c-wire. Use the chart below to confirm that your system meets the compatibility requirements. This chart will determine compatibility with most systems, but as wiring systems vary from home to home, there may be some exceptions.

 1. Does your current thermostat have 110V or higher written on it? If yes this system is compatible — continue to next question.
 2. Do you have thick wires that are connected using wire nuts? If yes — your system is not compatible. If no — continue to the next question.
 3. Do you have a wire connected to terminal labeled "C"? If yes — your system is compatible. If no move the next question.
 4. Do you have an extra wire that is not connected to any terminal on the thermostat wall plate? Or — if no — do you have a wire connected to terminal labeled "G"? If yes to either of these questions, this thermostat may be compatible with your system.

To help you know for sure if your system will work with the Wi-Fi thermostat, please send us a picture of your current thermostat wiring. Take a picture of your current wall plate with wires connected to the lettered terminals.
